name: Porcus
description:
Enter the Out of Control World of Porcus!!!!

Submitted for the GMTK Game Jam for July 2020.  This game represents the theme of "Out of Control" by having the main character's bash movement be one of uncontrollable rage!  This means that you lose control of the character once a bash movement is initiated and it will only stop once Porcus hits a wall.  NOTE:  You can activate the BASH MOVEMENT by hitting X or SPACEBAR on the keyboard.

This was a challenging game jam for the team and all assets including art, code, and music were produced during the gamejam.  This is one where we felt lucky just to submit something as it was our team's first attempt at an adventure style game.
